attacks.name: Healing Pollen
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. For each heads, remove 1 damage counter from each of your Pokémon. If a Pokémon has fewer damage counters than the number of heads, remove all of them.

attacks.name: Sonic Distortion
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. If 1 or both of them are heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.
